proposal1.heroHeadline: Otto is losing 400 hours annually on proposals. This is where it all drains.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting proposals eats into hours that could win clients. With 47-second automation, Otto reclaims this time.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Otto is bleeding resources through inefficient proposal processes.

problems.title: Hours Wasted
problems.description: Otto spends an average of 20 hours per week on proposals. That's over 1,000 hours a year not spent on client acquisition.

problems.title: Client Response Delays
problems.description: Delays in proposal delivery lead to missed opportunities. Every day a proposal is late is a potential client lost.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manually crafted proposals lead to branding inconsistencies. Each inconsistency risks Otto's professional image, costing client trust.

problems.title: Overhead Costs
problems.description: High labor costs from manual proposal writing. This drains financial resources that could be reinvested in growth.

problems.title: Reduced Team Morale
problems.description: Team members are bogged down with repetitive tasks. This decreases morale and productivity, impacting Otto's bottom line.

problems.title: Lost Competitive Edge
problems.description: Slow proposals mean competitors get there first. Otto misses out on the chance to secure clients quickly.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces these inefficiencies with streamlined automation.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, crafting each proposal is a manual slog. Our system generates complete proposals in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Proposals currently risk inconsistent branding. Our solution ensures every proposal aligns with Otto's professional image.

solutions.title: Real-Time Tracking
solutions.description: Without tracking, proposals disappear into a void. Our system tracks proposal views and client interactions instantly.

solutions.title: AI Chatbot Assistance
solutions.description: Manual follow-ups are time-consuming. Our AI chatbot engages clients immediately, enhancing responsiveness.

solutions.title: Resource Reallocation
solutions.description: Current processes waste valuable resources. Automated proposals free up time and money for strategic initiatives.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Otto's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Otto around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Otto.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transforming Acme Corp's Success with Otto's Expertise
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We craft data-driven marketing strategies to increase your ROI. Let's enhance your brand presence and drive sales.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently experiencing significant losses due to missed opportunities.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door. This results in a 20% potential monthly revenue loss.

problems.title: Poor Brand Awareness
problems.description: Without strong brand recognition, Acme Corp loses potential customers to competitors. This results in a 15% lower market share.

problems.title: Ineffective Ad Spend
problems.description: Suboptimal ad targeting leads to wasted budget. This results in a 25% increase in acquisition costs.

problems.title: Lagging Digital Presence
problems.description: An outdated digital presence drives customers away. This results in a 30% reduction in potential engagement.

problems.title: Weak Customer Retention
problems.description: Lack of engagement strategies causes loyal customers to churn. This results in a 10% annual revenue loss.

problems.title: Limited Market Insights
problems.description: Without data-backed insights, strategic decisions are less effective. This results in a 20% slower growth rate.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions directly address these issues to transform opportunities into success.

solutions.title: Digital Advertising
solutions.description: Maximize your ad spend efficiency by reaching the right audience. This increases conversion rates and reduces costs.

solutions.title: Brand Strategy
solutions.description: Enhance brand visibility through strategic positioning. This improves recognition and strengthens market share.

solutions.title: Market Research
solutions.description: Gain actionable insights into market trends. This informs strategic decisions and improves competitiveness.

solutions.title: Content Marketing
solutions.description: Engage your audience with relevant content. This boosts digital presence and customer loyalty.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Choose Otto for our proven track record and strategic insights.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team has a strong history of delivering measurable results for clients across industries.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We prioritize your business goals and tailor strategies to meet your unique needs.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Strategies
whyUsCards.description: We leverage data to craft strategies that drive growth and improve ROI.

whyUsCards.title: Comprehensive Services
whyUsCards.description: From strategy to execution, we offer a full suite of marketing services to drive success.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the dedicated team driving your success.

team.name: Pete Leddy
team.bio: Leading strategy and fostering client relationships to ensure success. Over 15 years of industry experience.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery Phase
process.description: We begin by understanding your business and market landscape.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: We create a tailored strategy to address your specific challenges.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We execute the strategy with precision and agility.

process.title: Optimization
process.description: We analyze results and refine tactics for maximum impact.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Explore our investment options tailored to your needs.

pricing.name: Basic Package
pricing.description: Ideal for businesses seeking foundational support.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses aiming for significant growth.

pricing.name: Enterprise Package
pricing.description: Perfect for businesses requiring extensive market presence.

proposal2.ctaHeadline: Ready to Transform Acme Corp's Future?
proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how we can drive your business forward. No obligation, just a conversation.
